title: To the City of the Clouds
creator: Choice of Games LLC

extendedInfo.description: Search for the lost Incan city known as La Ciudad de las Nubes in the mountains of Colombia. Your fledgling archaeologist will battle venomous pit vipers, tropical diseases, and the FARC guerrilla army to secure fame, fortune, and tenure at a prestigious university. Alcohol, lustful young students, and Incan spirits delight and bedevil you along the way."To the City of the Clouds" is a thrilling interactive adventure novel where your choices determine how the story proceeds. The game is entirely text-based--without graphics or sound effects--but powered by the vast, unstoppable power of your imagination.Choose your persona, your sexual orientation, and your propensity to wear khaki native huipiles...then let the adventure begin!

reviews.comment: It\'s extremely boring...plus the writing was childish and I dislike how I was predetermined to be a crack head drunk and every girl wanted to have sex with me on sight.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Too short
reviews.comment: Ends all too soon and without realising its potential. Not up to the standard set by the other Choice of Games but still fun.
reviews.author: Jarrod Holst

reviews.title: Excellent!
reviews.comment: I have read about 6 in a half times now and I love the story. Great writer, great story, great options!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Short and Linear
reviews.comment: I had fun while playing it, but I felt that the story went by too quickly, and I never really got to know any of the characters. Even the player-created character seemed a bit too shallow. The game could\'ve benefited from a more personal touch with more interactions. For what it is, the game is fun, but the replay value is pretty low.
reviews.author: Jeff Peterson

reviews.title: Overall good game.
reviews.comment: Has an awesome storyline even though its short (and every new game is 2$) The customizations are great when it came to the player but a few of the skills are useless. I\'ll give it a 3, because it well..need more suprise, exspectielly in the end, that was a tad dissapointing.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Come to TIN Man Games! Better UI, BETTER OVERALL with the same if not better price as choice of games.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not at their best
reviews.comment: The games is okay, but Choice of the Vampire and others were better.  Doesn\'t seem to have as much different scenes, and too many not often used stats.  Also felt like there were a lot of hastily tied loose threads.  I would recommend buying Choice of the Vampire 2(in beta) instead of this one.  Choice of Games isn\'t at its best here.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Blah
reviews.comment: Useless stats and wat happened to the chicken. Also not exciting at all.

reviews.title: Hmmm
reviews.comment: It\'s a good game.  But not very long. :(

reviews.title: Okay
reviews.comment: I didn\'t like that the story was short it felt like it was rushed.

reviews.title: Not exactly a cyoa game
reviews.comment: No doubt whoever wrote this was an archaeologist. So many inside jokes! However, it was more about archaeology expose than a cyoa game. It has no plot or ending whatsoever. I gave it 3 stars solely out of peer support.
reviews.author: Stella Chen

reviews.title: Disappointing
reviews.comment: Game had a abrupt ending. Also felt It really short compared to the other COG games.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs more variety and story
reviews.comment: Good action sequences, but needs more variety in usual skills, enemies, and items. Plus the story was rather short with an unexciting ending.

reviews.title: Well, nice story, but very short
reviews.comment: Not too impressive, although nice and leaving you hungry for more

reviews.title: Least favorite of their games so far.

reviews.comment: Way too short, definitely not as good as others, choices don\'t seem to matter as much.

reviews.comment: One of the best-written ChoiceOf Games.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It\'s ok.
reviews.comment: Rather weak as Choice games go. The romance doesn\'t compare to Broadsides or Vampire. Basically it\'s assumed that everyone in the world wants to sleep with you, and all you decide is when. Likewise, you\'re assumed to be a drinker, and all you decide is when and what you drink. Since I\'m not a drinker, it put me off a bit that my character had to be. Not too bad a game, but go for Eerie Estate Agent, or Hero\'s Rise, and and pass this one up unless you\'re really into archeology or cocaine.
reviews.author: A Google User
